alert.note: Alert for Calhoun; Gadsden; Jackson (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 01 at 4:21PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Jackson and northeastern Calhoun Counties in the Panhandle of Florida, northwestern Gadsden County in Big Bend of Florida, southwestern Decatur and south central Seminole Counties in southwestern Georgia through 500 PM EDT/400 PM CDT/... At 421 PM EDT/321 PM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Chattahoochee, or 18 miles northwest of Quincy, moving northeast at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Quincy, Greensboro, Chattahoochee, Sneads, Gretna, Grand Ridge, Ocheesee, Juniper, Douglas City, Rosedale, Union City, Santa Clara, Jinks, Star, Quincy Airport, Alliance, Sawdust, Dogtown, Mount Pleasant and Hardin Heights. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
